pp0.name: R&D
pp0.content: Sometimes R&D tobe the game changer, they create the innovative product

pp1.name: Factory/workshop
pp1.content: Build factory/workshop to create the product, it costs time but effective

pp2.name: Outsource
pp2.content: Hiring other company or freelancers to build the product, a fast way to build product but not so effective

pp3.name: Buying other factory/workshop
pp3.content: The fastest way to build product but cost money

pp4.name: Service
pp4.content: Maintain machines, help your factories/workshops work well
